name: Legendary Quest of Sándor Rózsa - Autumn Special
name_original: Legendary Quest of Sándor Rózsa - Autumn Special
description:
You control Sándor, and collect grapes in the first phase, and then stomp the grapes to stum in the second phase. The goal is to make as many points as you can. For that you can catch grapes in mid-air, and avoid rotten ones. Starlings gather when any grape hits the ground, but after certain points you get a pistol so you can drive them away.

Controls for keyboard:

arrows left - right, or A - D: move left - right

Space: jump

Enter: shoot pistol (if avialable)

Controls for gamepad:

sticks or Dpad left - right: move left - right

A: jump

Right Trigger: shoot pistol (if avialable)

This is a minigame, the first one I actually finished in GMS2. It was not just a practice project for coding but for having try out some strange mechanics, not ordinary in a platformer like game. I plan to make a game with this character in the future, where I would include levels like this minigame.

Credits:

Original music by Kerekes Band, remix and sounds made by Vincenzo.

Code and graphics was made be my.

This is a prototype, a practice project not a fully realized game, so take it as it is and have fun playing it. :)

See this, and more on my homepage: https://pixelkrajcar.com/

I post something new now and then on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pixelkrajcar
